user_id.description: Unique identifier for the user who wrote the review (required).

place_id.description: Unique identifier for the place being reviewed (required).

content.description: The text content of the review (required).

sentiment_score.description: Sentiment score of the review (-1 to 1, required).

rating.description: Optional user rating for the place (0 to 5 stars).

timestamp.description: The date and time when the review was written (required).

keywords.description: Array of extracted keywords from the review content.

likes.description: Number of likes/upvotes on the review (default to 0).

response_id.description: Unique ID for the response to the review.

content.description: The text content of the response.

user_id.description: User ID of the person responding.

timestamp.description: The date and time when the response was made.

responses.description: Array of responses to the review.
